title: OOHTML
desc: A suite of new DOM features that particularly facilitates writing modular, reusable, and reactive HTML and JavaScript natively and more conveniently.

features.title: Reusable HTML
features.desc: Write once, use everywhere with an all-new module, export and import paradigm.

features.title: Reactive HTML
features.desc: Get the plain old HTML kicking in sync with your application data, entirely within markup.

features.title: Namespaced HTML
features.desc: Write collision-free IDs with HTML namespaces; meet the hack-free approach.

features.title: All On the Fly!
features.desc: Forget the compile step! Just code and preview, and even edit from the browser console.
